attributes.action: Parents should not have to choose between health and education.
attributes.background: Schools without distancing are not safe. Opening and closing schools is not sustainable education. Test and trace is not functioning properly. We need sustainable education blended with virtual education, smaller class bubbles, rotation every fortnight, masks in the classrooms and with no fines.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require schools to adopt a part-time attendance rota while Covid-19 is a threat: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551615

Suspend fines for school non-attendance during Covid-19 & allow parental choice: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740

Make masks mandatory for primary school students and teachers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551102

Make wearing face masks mandatory in secondary schools and colleges: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330227
